goal.en: This is the basic level language course in Chinese. This course will focus much on speaking and listening skills. Class meetings are 3 hours per week in one semester.
goal.ch: 強化日常華語聽說能力

content.en:
Listening: Can understand short phrases and sentences of daily life such as shopping, answering phone call and simple questions.
Speaking: Can do self-introduction about your work, country and school. Can order drink and ask questions when need help.
Reading: Can read menus and some shop signs.
Writing: Can write simple words and phrases.
content.ch: 課堂用語/生活用語/語言學習網站介紹、自我介紹、數字與生活、日用品、行為與事件、情緒和感覺、方位/位置、身體/看病
